archival

I'm a bit of an /r/DataHoarder and have collected around 20 TB of content that interests me. I dump CDs, mirror websites, and occasionally steal files from Apple Store demo machines.

I've shared a subset on my Internet Archive profile and plan to upload more over time.

Get in touch if you'd like to swap files!
